review: Fire TV is great for people who buys, rent movies, episodes on Amazon Instant and have Prime Subscription. Setting it up was quick, it was already register to my account when it was powered on for the first time. Unfortunately there's no way to listen privately via headphones and the remote is a bit uncomfortable to use compare to Roku remote. The Mirror cast option, has not work for me, my htc one m8 will connect then disconnect for a little bit and my windows 8 laptop can't connect. Perhaps investing in $99 version of Fire TV will fix this issue and able to listen privately via Bluetooth headphones. But for now, watching videos, accessing popular apps, Youtube, Netflex, HBO Go, Hulu, Vevo, etc...is all I need.
author: Michael P
